data.name: Better Keys
data.description: Increases the amount of money you earn from each word typed.

data.name: Longer Words
data.description: Increases the average length of words you are given to type.

data.name: Monkey Typist
data.description: The monkey typist will type words for you and earn money passively (affected by better keys).

data.name: Combo Bonus
data.description: Increases the bonus you receive for typing multiple words in a row without mistakes.

data.name: Automatic Keyboard
data.description: Unlocks an automatic keyboard that types words for you, earning money passively (affected by better keys).

data.name: Word Printer
data.description: Unlocks a word printer that prints words for you, earning money passively (affected by better keys).
